snippet: Ms. Brewer abolished the state’s beleaguered Child Protective Services, immediately transferring the task of safeguarding abused and neglected children to a new cabinet-level division.
abstract: Arizona Gov Jan Brewer abolishes state’s beleaguered Child Protective Services, immediately transferring task of safeguarding abused and neglected children to new cabinet-level division over which she will have direct oversight.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Brewer abolished the state’s beleaguered Child Protective Services, immediately transferring the task of safeguarding abused and neglected children to a new cabinet-level division.

headline.main: Gov. Jan Brewer of Arizona Overhauls Child Welfare System
